summary: Interactive romantic Valentine web page (HTML/CSS/JS) with Yes/No interaction (No evades hover), and on Yes shows a specific meme GIF (girl doctor + boy photographer), intended to run on iPad Chrome; user has chosen to set up a custom URL/domain (not just a shareable URL).

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko with accompanying Candid interface and generated frontend declarations.

existing_features.title: React + Vite frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend application scaffolded with React/TypeScript and Vite, including styling setup (Tailwind/index.css) and app entrypoints.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Frontend auth flow integrated with Internet Identity via dedicated hooks/utilities.

existing_features.title: Typed canister actor integration
existing_features.description: Frontend includes typed canister bindings and an actor hook/utilities to call the backend canister from the UI.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library included
existing_features.description: Project includes a shadcn/ui-based component set (accordion, dialog, sidebar, etc.) and supporting utilities/config.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template tooling for ICP
existing_features.description: Repository includes build-template assets (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, canister.yaml, workspace/package configs) and scripts for image processing/pruning.

existing_features.title: Client-side storage utility
existing_features.description: Frontend includes a StorageClient utility for managing persisted client-side state.

existing_features.title: GitHub export / ICP CLI build support
existing_features.description: Includes project-level build and configuration assets aimed at GitHub export and ICP CLI usage (e.g., build.sh and icp.yaml) alongside the existing build-template tooling.

existing_features.title: Add a “Custom domain” setup view in the frontend that lets the user enter a domain name (e.g., example.com) and displays clear, step-by-step instructions for pointing that domain to the currently deployed Internet Computer app URL (canister URL), including showing the current canister URL and providing copy-to-clipboard for the URL and any DNS values shown.

Add repository documentation (README section or a new docs page referenced from the README) describing how to set up a custom domain for this Internet Computer-hosted frontend, including what DNS records the user must create and where they should expect the site to be reachable after propagation (while keeping the instructions provider-agnostic).

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide a shareable deployment URL and/or support setting up a custom URL/domain for the Valentine page

architectural_notes: Project is structured as an ICP dapp with separate backend (Motoko canister) and frontend (React/Vite) plus generated Candid/TypeScript declarations for typed calls.
Authentication uses Internet Identity and is surfaced in the frontend via dedicated hooks (e.g., useInternetIdentity) and actor wiring (e.g., useActor).
UI is built on shadcn/ui components with Tailwind/CSS configuration included.
Build/deployment is supported by a reusable build-template (Dockerfile, deploy script, canister configs) and helper scripts for asset/image maintenance.
Build-template now includes additional frontend quality/guardrails via custom ESLint rules (e.g., requiring Internet Identity provider wiring and avoiding BigInt usage in query keys).
Build-template frontend scaffold expanded with a broad set of shadcn/ui component implementations and supporting config (eslint/postcss/vite/tsconfig, components.json, env.json).

Repository includes additional project-level build/config assets to support GitHub export and ICP CLI-oriented workflows (e.g., build.sh and icp.yaml), complementing the existing build-template/deploy scripts.
